00035 void eol_entity_config()
00036 {
00037   eolConfig *conf = NULL;
00038   eolLine    buf;
00039   _eol_entity_max = 1024;
00040   _eol_entity_trail_max = 16;
00041   _eol_entity_draw_mode = eolEntityDrawBounds;
00042 
00043   conf = eol_config_load("system/entity.cfg");
00044   if (conf != NULL)
00045   {
00046     eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&_eol_entity_max,conf,"entityMax");
00047     eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&_eol_entity_trail_max,conf,"trailLenth");
00048     eol_config_get_line_by_tag(buf,conf,"entityDraw");
00049     if (strlen(buf))
00050     {
00051       if ((eol_line_cmp(buf,"box")==0) ||
00052           (eol_line_cmp(buf,"bounds")==0))
00053       {
00054         _eol_entity_draw_mode = eolEntityDrawBounds;
00055       }
00056       else if ((eol_line_cmp(buf,"wire")==0) ||
00057                (eol_line_cmp(buf,"wireframe")==0))
00058       {
00059         _eol_entity_draw_mode = eolEntityDrawWireframe;
00060       }
00061       else if ((eol_line_cmp(buf,"flat")==0) ||
00062                (eol_line_cmp(buf,"mesh")==0))
00063       {
00064         _eol_entity_draw_mode = eolEntityDrawMesh;
00065       }
00066       else if ((eol_line_cmp(buf,"skin")==0) ||
00067                (eol_line_cmp(buf,"texture")==0))
00068       {
00069         _eol_entity_draw_mode = eolEntityDrawTextured;
00070       }
00071       else if (eol_line_cmp(buf,"light")==0)
00072       {
00073         _eol_entity_draw_mode = eolEntityDrawLighting;
00074       }
00075       else if ((eol_line_cmp(buf,"shader")==0) ||
00076                (eol_line_cmp(buf,"full")==0))
00077       {
00078         _eol_entity_draw_mode = eolEntityDrawShaded;
00079       }
00080       else if ((eol_line_cmp(buf,"texture_bounds")==0) ||
00081                (eol_line_cmp(buf,"bounds_texture")==0))
00082       {
00083         _eol_entity_draw_mode = eolEntityDrawTexturedBound;
00084       }
00085     }
00086     eol_config_free(&conf);
00087   }
00088   switch(_eol_entity_draw_mode)
00089   {
00090     case eolEntityDrawBounds:
00091       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_box;
00092       break;
00093     case eolEntityDrawWireframe:
00094       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_wire;
00095       break;
00096     case eolEntityDrawMesh:
00097       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_textured;
00098       break;
00099     case eolEntityDrawTextured:
00100       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_textured;
00101       break;
00102     case eolEntityDrawLighting:
00103       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_textured;
00104       break;
00105     case eolEntityDrawShaded:
00106       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_textured;
00107       break;
00108     case eolEntityDrawTexturedBound:
00109       _eol_entity_draw_func = eol_entity_draw_textured_bound;
00110       break;
00111   }
00112 }

00114 void eol_entity_init()
00115 {
00116   eol_logger_message(
00117       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00118       "eol_entity:initializing\n");
00119   _eol_entity_manager = eol_resource_manager_init(
00120     "eol_entity_manager",
00121     _eol_entity_max,
00122     sizeof(eolEntity) + _eol_entity_custom_data_size,
00123     eolTrue,
00124     eol_entity_delete,
00125     eol_entity_load_data_from_file
00126     );
00127   eol_logger_message(
00128       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00129       "eol_entity:initialized\n");
00130   atexit(eol_entity_close);
00131   _eol_entity_initialized = eolTrue;
00132 
00133 }
00134 
00135 void eol_entity_close()
00136 {
00137   eol_logger_message(
00138     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00139     "eol_entity:closing\n");
00140   eol_resource_manager_free(&_eol_entity_manager);
00141   _eol_entity_max = 0;
00142   _eol_entity_custom_data_size = 0;
00143   _eol_entity_custom_delete = NULL;
00144   _eol_entity_initialized = eolFalse;
00145   eol_logger_message(
00146     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00147     "eol_entity:closed\n");
00148 }

00150 void eol_entity_clear()
00151 {
00152   if (!eol_entity_initialized())
00153   {
00154     eol_logger_message(
00155       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00156       "eol_entity:cannot clear, not initialized\n");
00157     return;
00158   }
00159   if (!_eol_entity_manager)return;
00160   eol_resource_manager_clear(_eol_entity_manager);
00161 }

00173 void eol_entity_delete(void *entityData)
00174 {
00175   eolEntity *ent;
00176   GList *it = NULL;
00177   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00178   if (!entityData)return;
00179   ent = (eolEntity *)entityData;
00180   if ((_eol_entity_custom_delete != NULL) &&
00181       (_eol_entity_custom_data_size != 0))
00182   {
00183     _eol_entity_custom_delete(ent->customData);
00184   }
00185   if (ent->children != NULL)
00186   {
00187     for (it = ent->children; it != NULL; it = it->next)
00188     {
00189       /*data should be pointing to an eolEntityPointer*/
00190       if (it->data != NULL)free(it->data);
00191     }
00192   }
00193   for (it = ent->actorList; it != NULL; it = it->next)
00194   {
00195     if (it->data)
00196     {
00197       eol_actor_free((eolActor**)&it->data);
00198     }
00199   }
00200   it = NULL;
00201   g_list_free(ent->actorList);
00202   ent->actor = NULL;
00203   ent->actorList = NULL;
00204   /*physics*/
00205   if (ent->body != NULL)cpBodyFree(ent->body);
00206   if (ent->shape != NULL)cpShapeFree(ent->shape);
00207   eol_config_free(&ent->config);
00208  
00209   memset(ent,0,sizeof(eolEntity));
00210 }
00211 
00212 void eol_entity_free(eolEntity **ent)
00213 {
00214   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00215   eol_entity_remove_from_space(*ent);
00216   eol_resource_free_element(_eol_entity_manager,(void **)ent);
00217 }
00218 
00219 eolEntity *eol_entity_new()
00220 {
00221   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00222   if (!eol_entity_initialized())
00223   {
00224     eol_logger_message(
00225       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00226       "eol_entdow:used uninitialized\n");
00227     return NULL;
00228   }
00229   ent = (eolEntity *)eol_resource_new_element(_eol_entity_manager);
00230   if (ent == NULL)
00231   {
00232     eol_logger_message(
00233       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00234       "eol_entity:failed to get new resource\n");
00235     return NULL;
00236   }
00237   if (_eol_entity_custom_data_size > 0)
00238   {
00239     /*the resource system has allocated the custom data in the same continuous block
00240       as this entity*/
00241     ent->customData = (void *)(ent + 1);
00242   }
00243   /*set some sane defaults:*/
00244   ent->self = ent;
00245   ent->collisionMask = CP_ALL_LAYERS;
00246   eol_orientation_clear(&ent->ori);
00247   eol_trail_new(&ent->trail,_eol_entity_trail_max);
00248   ent->shown = eolTrue;
00249   ent->team = CP_NO_GROUP;
00250   ent->id = eol_resource_element_get_id(_eol_entity_manager,ent);
00251   return ent;
00252 }

00281 /*sync with physics system*/
00282 
00283 void eol_entity_postsync(eolEntity * ent)
00284 {
00285   cpVect p;
00286   eolUint count = 0;
00287   eolFloat factor = 0;
00288   eolVec3D * tempVec;
00289   GList *it;
00290   if (!ent)return;
00291   /*sync with the physics body*/
00292   if (ent->body == NULL)return;
00293   p = cpBodyGetPos(ent->body);
00294   ent->ori.position.x = p.x;
00295   ent->ori.position.y = p.y;
00296   if (ent->trackTrail)
00297   {
00298     eol_trail_append(&ent->trail,ent->ori);
00299   }
00300 
00301   /*entity-entity collisions are most important...*/
00302   for (it = ent->normals;it != NULL;it = it->next)
00303   {
00304     if (it->data)free(it->data);
00305   }
00306   g_list_free(ent->normals);
00307   ent->normals = NULL;
00308   
00309   cpBodyEachArbiter(ent->body, (cpBodyArbiterIteratorFunc)eol_entity_handle_touch, ent);
00310   eol_vec3d_clear(ent->normal);
00311   for (it = ent->normals,count = 0;it != NULL;it = it->next,count++)
00312   {
00313     if (it->data != NULL)
00314     {
00315       tempVec = (eolVec3D *)it->data;
00316       eol_vec3d_add(ent->normal,
00317                     (*tempVec),
00318                     ent->normal);
00319     }
00320   }
00321   if (count > 0)
00322   {
00323     factor = 1.0f/(float)count;
00324     eol_vec3d_scale(ent->normal,ent->normal,factor);
00325     eol_vec3d_normalize(&ent->normal);
00326     /*TODO this needs to compare based on local gravity direction*/
00327     if (ent->normal.y < -0.5)ent->grounded = eolTrue;
00328     if (ent->grounded)
00329     {
00330       eol_vec3d_clear(ent->gravity);
00331     }
00332     eol_entity_handle_world_touch(ent);
00333   }
00334 }
00335 
00336 void eol_entity_presync(eolEntity *ent)
00337 {
00338   if (!ent)return;
00339   if (ent->state == eolEntityDead)
00340   {
00341     eol_entity_free(&ent);
00342     return;
00343   }
00344 
00345   if (ent->dampening)
00346   {
00347     if (fabs(ent->vector.position.x) > ent->dampening)
00348     {
00349       if (ent->vector.position.x < 0)ent->vector.position.x += ent->dampening;
00350       else ent->vector.position.x -= ent->dampening;
00351     }
00352     else ent->vector.position.x = 0;
00353     if (fabs(ent->vector.position.y) > ent->dampening)
00354     {
00355       if (ent->vector.position.y < 0)ent->vector.position.y += ent->dampening;
00356       else ent->vector.position.y -= ent->dampening;
00357     }
00358     else ent->vector.position.y = 0;
00359     if (fabs(ent->vector.position.z) > ent->dampening)
00360     {
00361       if (ent->vector.position.z < 0)ent->vector.position.z += ent->dampening;
00362       else ent->vector.position.z -= ent->dampening;
00363     }
00364     else ent->vector.position.z = 0;
00365 
00366   }
00367 
00368   eol_orientation_add(&ent->vector,
00369                         ent->vector,
00370                         ent->accel);
00371 
00372   if ( !eol_vec3d_magnitude_less_than(ent->vector.position,ent->topSpeed))
00373   {
00374     eol_vec3d_set_magnitude(&ent->vector.position,ent->topSpeed);
00375   }
00376   /*always apply gravity after personal vector movement*/
00377   if (!ent->grounded)
00378   {
00379     eol_vec3d_add(ent->vector.position,ent->vector.position,ent->gravityAccel);
00380   }
00381   
00382   ent->grounded = eolFalse;
00383   ent->bounced = eolFalse;
00384   ent->wallTouch = eolFalse;
00385 
00386   if (ent->body != NULL)
00387   {
00388     cpBodySetPos(ent->body, cpv(ent->ori.position.x,ent->ori.position.y));
00389     cpBodySetVel(ent->body, cpv(ent->vector.position.x,ent->vector.position.y));
00390     cpBodyActivate(ent->body);
00391   }
00392 }
00393 
00394 void eol_entity_presync_all()
00395 {
00396   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00397   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00398   while ((ent = eol_resource_get_next_data(_eol_entity_manager,ent)) != NULL)
00399   {
00400     eol_entity_presync(ent);
00401   }
00402 }
00403 
00404 void eol_entity_postsync_all()
00405 {
00406   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00407   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00408   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00409   while ((ent = eol_resource_get_next_data(_eol_entity_manager,ent)) != NULL)
00410   {
00411     eol_entity_postsync(ent);
00412   }
00413 }

00415 void eol_entity_update_all()
00416 {
00417   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00418   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00419   while ((ent = eol_resource_get_next_data(_eol_entity_manager,ent)) != NULL)
00420   {
00421     if (ent->update != NULL)
00422     {
00423       ent->update(ent);
00424     }
00425   }
00426 }
00427 
00428 void eol_entity_think_all()
00429 {
00430   eolUint now;
00431   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00432   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00433   now = eol_graphics_get_now();
00434   while ((ent = eol_resource_get_next_data(_eol_entity_manager,ent)) != NULL)
00435   {
00436     if (ent->think != NULL)
00437     {
00438       if ((ent->thinkRate == -1) ||
00439           (ent->thinkNext < now))
00440       {
00441         ent->think(ent);
00442         if (ent->thinkRate != -1)
00443         {
00444           ent->thinkNext += ent->thinkRate;
00445         }
00446       }
00447     }
00448   }
00449 }
00450 
00451 void eol_entity_draw_box(eolEntity *ent)
00452 {
00453   eolRectFloat rect;
00454   eolOrientation ori;
00455   if (!ent)return;
00456   switch (ent->shapeType)
00457   {
00458     case eolEntityRect:
00459       rect.x = ent->boundingBox.w* -0.5;
00460       rect.y = ent->boundingBox.h* -0.5;
00461       rect.w = ent->boundingBox.w;
00462       rect.h = ent->boundingBox.h;
00463       eol_orientation_copy(&ori,ent->ori);
00464       eol_vec3d_clear(ori.rotation);
00465       eol_draw_rect_3D(rect, ori);
00466       break;
00467     case eolEntityCircle:
00468       eol_draw_cirlce_3D(ent->ori.position,
00469                         ent->radius,
00470                         32,
00471                         ent->ori.color,
00472                         ent->ori.alpha);
00473       break;
00474     default:
00475       eol_draw_dot_3D(ent->ori.position,
00476                       ent->radius,
00477                       ent->ori.color,
00478                       ent->ori.alpha);
00479   }
00480 }
00481 
00482 void eol_entity_draw_wire(eolEntity *ent)
00483 {
00484   GList *list;
00485   if (!ent)return;
00486   for (list = ent->actorList;list != NULL;list = list->next)
00487   {
00488     if (list->data != NULL)
00489     {
00490       eol_actor_draw_wire((eolActor *)list->data,
00491                      ent->ori.position,
00492                      ent->ori.rotation,
00493                      ent->ori.scale,
00494                      ent->ori.color,
00495                      ent->ori.alpha);
00496     }
00497   }
00498 }

00518 void eol_entity_draw_textured_bound(eolEntity *ent)
00519 {
00520   GList *list;
00521   if (!ent)return;
00522   for (list = ent->actorList;list != NULL;list = list->next)
00523   {
00524     if (list->data != NULL)
00525     {
00526       eol_entity_draw_box(ent);
00527       eol_actor_draw((eolActor *)list->data,
00528                     ent->ori.position,
00529                     ent->ori.rotation,
00530                     ent->ori.scale,
00531                     ent->ori.color,
00532                     ent->ori.alpha);
00533     }
00534   }

00536 
00537 void eol_entity_draw(eolEntity *ent)
00538 {
00539   if (!ent)return;
00540   if (ent->shown == eolFalse)
00541   {
00542     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_entity:skipping draw re: not shown\n");
00543     return;
00544   }
00545   /*NOTE: may end up drawing other effects...*/
00546   if (ent->ori.alpha == 0.0f)
00547   {
00548     eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_entity:skipping draw re: 0 alpha\n");
00549     return;
00550   }
00551   if (_eol_entity_draw_func != NULL)
00552   {
00553     _eol_entity_draw_func(ent);
00554   }
00555   else
00556   {
00557     eol_entity_draw_textured(ent);
00558   }
00559   if (ent->drawTrail)
00560   {
00561     eol_draw_trail(&ent->trail,
00562                    ent->trailWidth,
00563                    eolFalse,
00564                    eolFalse);
00565   }
00566 }
00567 
00568 void eol_entity_draw_all()
00569 {
00570   eolEntity *ent = NULL;
00571   if (!eol_entity_initialized())return;
00572   while ((ent = eol_resource_get_next_data(_eol_entity_manager,ent)) != NULL)
00573   {
00574     eol_entity_draw(ent);
00575   }
00576 }

00578 
00579 /*physics sync*/
00580 
00581 void eol_entity_handle_world_touch(eolEntity *ent)
00582 {
00583   if (!ent)return;
00584   if (ent->bounces)
00585   {
00586     eol_vec3d_reflect(&ent->vector.position, ent->normal,ent->vector.position);
00587     ent->bounced = eolTrue;
00588   }
00589   if (ent->levelTouch != NULL)
00590   {
00591     ent->levelTouch(ent,NULL);
00592   }
00593 }
00594 
00595 static void eol_entity_handle_touch(cpBody *body, cpArbiter *arbiter, void *data)
00596 {
00597   eolUint count = 0;
00598   int i;
00599   eolEntity *self = (eolEntity *)data;
00600   eolEntity *other = NULL;
00601   cpBody *counterBody = NULL;
00602   cpShape *counterShape = NULL;
00603   cpShape *s1,*s2;
00604   cpVect cpnormal,cppoint;
00605   eolVec3D normal,point;
00606   if (self == NULL)
00607   {
00608     eol_logger_message(
00609       EOL_LOG_ERROR,"Given bad pointer to self in HandleEntityTouch.\n");
00610     return;
00611   }
00612   if ((self->touch == NULL) && (self->levelTouch == NULL))
00613   {
00614     /*no need to do any more work here*/
00615     return;
00616   }
00617   count = cpArbiterGetCount(arbiter);
00618   cpArbiterGetShapes(arbiter, &s1, &s2);
00619   for (i = 0; i < count;i++)
00620   {
00621     cpnormal = cpArbiterGetNormal(arbiter, i);
00622     cppoint = cpArbiterGetPoint(arbiter, i);
00623     eol_vec3d_set(normal,cpnormal.x,cpnormal.y,0);
00624     eol_vec3d_set(point,cppoint.x,cppoint.y,0);
00625     if (s1[i].body == body)
00626     {
00627       counterBody = s2[i].body;
00628       counterShape = &s2[i];
00629     }
00630     else
00631     {
00632       counterBody = s1[i].body;
00633       counterShape = &s1[i];
00634     }
00635     if(cpBodyIsStatic(counterBody))
00636     {
00637       /*world collision handler*/
00638       if (eol_equals(eol_vec3d_magnitude_squared(normal),1))
00639         self->normals = g_list_append(self->normals,eol_vec3d_dup(normal));
00640       return;
00641     }
00642     if (self->touch != NULL)
00643     {
00644       other = (eolEntity *)counterBody->data;
00645       self->touch(self,other);
00646     }
00647   }
00648 }
00649 
00650 /*space stuff*/
00651 void eol_entity_add_to_space(eolEntity *ent,cpSpace *space)
00652 {
00653   if ((!ent) || (!space))
00654   {
00655     eol_logger_message(
00656       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00657       "eol_entity:passed NULL data to add_to_space.\n");
00658     return;
00659   }
00660   if (ent->body == NULL)
00661   {
00662     eol_logger_message(
00663       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00664       "eol_entity:cannot add a NULL body to a space for entity %s.\n",
00665       ent->name);
00666     return;
00667   }
00668   if (ent->shape == NULL)
00669   {
00670     eol_logger_message(
00671       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00672       "eol_entity:cannot add a NULL shape to a space for entity %s.\n",
00673       ent->name);
00674     return;
00675   }
00676   if (cpSpaceAddBody(space, ent->body) == NULL)
00677   {
00678     eol_logger_message(
00679       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00680       "eol_entity:failed to add body to a space for entity %s.\n",
00681       ent->name);
00682     return;
00683   }
00684   ent->shape->collision_type = eolEntityClipEntities;
00685   if (cpSpaceAddShape(space, ent->shape) == NULL)
00686   {
00687     eol_logger_message(
00688       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00689       "eol_entity:failed to add shape to a space for entity %s.\n",
00690       ent->name);
00691     return;
00692   }
00693   ent->_space = space;
00694 }
00695 
00696 void eol_entity_remove_from_space(eolEntity *ent)
00697 {
00698   if (!ent)
00699   {
00700     eol_logger_message(
00701       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00702       "eol_entity:passed NULL data to remove_from_space.\n");
00703     return;
00704   }
00705   if (ent->_space == NULL)
00706   {
00707     return;
00708   }
00709   if (ent->body != NULL)
00710   {
00711     cpSpaceRemoveBody(ent->_space, ent->body);
00712     cpBodyFree(ent->body);
00713     ent->body = NULL;
00714   }
00715   if (ent->shape != NULL)
00716   {
00717     cpSpaceRemoveShape(ent->_space, ent->shape);
00718     cpShapeFree(ent->shape);
00719     ent->shape = NULL;
00720   }
00721   ent->_space = NULL;
00722 }
00723 
00724 void eol_entity_shape_make_circle(eolEntity *ent)
00725 {
00726   if (!ent)
00727   {
00728     eol_logger_message(
00729       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00730       "eol_entity:passed NULL data to shape make circle.\n");
00731     return;
00732   }
00733   /*cleanup any potential old space data*/
00734   eol_entity_remove_from_space(ent);
00735   ent->body = cpBodyNew(ent->mass, INFINITY);
00736   if (ent->body == NULL)
00737   {
00738     eol_logger_message(
00739     EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00740     "eol_entity:failed to create a new body for physics entity.\n");
00741     return;
00742   }
00743   ent->shapeType = eolEntityCircle;
00744   ent->shape = cpCircleShapeNew(ent->body, ent->radius, cpvzero);
00745   ent->body->data = ent;
00746   cpShapeSetGroup(ent->shape, ent->team);
00747   cpShapeSetLayers(ent->shape, ent->collisionMask);
00748 }
00749 
00750 void eol_entity_shape_make_rect(eolEntity *ent)
00751 {
00752   if (!ent)
00753   {
00754     eol_logger_message(
00755       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00756       "eol_entity:passed NULL data to shape make circle.\n");
00757     return;
00758   }
00759   eol_entity_remove_from_space(ent);
00760   if (ent->body == NULL)
00761   {
00762     ent->body = cpBodyNew(ent->mass, INFINITY);
00763     if (ent->body == NULL)
00764     {
00765       eol_logger_message(
00766         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00767         "eol_entity:failed to create a new body for physics entity.\n");
00768       return;
00769     }
00770   }
00771   if (ent->shape != NULL)
00772   {
00773     cpShapeFree(ent->shape);
00774   }
00775   ent->shapeType = eolEntityRect;
00776   ent->shape = cpBoxShapeNew(ent->body, ent->boundingBox.w, ent->boundingBox.h);
00777   ent->body->data = ent;
00778   cpShapeSetGroup(ent->shape, ent->team);
00779   cpShapeSetLayers(ent->shape, ent->collisionMask);
00780 }
00781 
00782 /*collision masks*/
00783 void eol_entity_set_collision_mask(eolEntity *ent,cpLayers collisionmask)
00784 {
00785   if (!ent)return;
00786   ent->collisionMask = collisionmask;
00787 }
00788 
00789 void eol_entity_add_to_collision_mask(eolEntity *ent,cpLayers collisionmask)
00790 {
00791   if (!ent)return;
00792   ent->collisionMask |= collisionmask;
00793 }
00794 
00795 void eol_entity_remove_entity_from_collision_mask(eolEntity *ent,cpLayers collisionmask)
00796 {
00797   if (!ent)return;
00798   ent->collisionMask = ent->collisionMask & ~collisionmask;
00799 }
00800 
00801 /*entity data*/
00802 void eol_entity_set_actor_bounds(eolEntity *ent)
00803 {
00804   eolActor * act;
00805   if ((!ent) || (!ent->actor))return;
00806   act = ent->actor;
00807   if ((act->model != NULL )&&(act->model->_mesh != NULL))
00808   {
00809     ent->boundingBox.x = -act->model->_mesh->bounds.x/2;
00810     ent->boundingBox.y = -act->model->_mesh->bounds.y/2;
00811     ent->boundingBox.w = act->model->_mesh->bounds.x;
00812     ent->boundingBox.h = act->model->_mesh->bounds.y;
00813     ent->radius = act->model->_mesh->bounds.y/2 * 0.6;
00814   }
00815 }
00816 
00817 void eol_entity_add_actor(eolEntity *ent,eolActor *act)
00818 {
00819   if ((!ent)||(!act))return;
00820   ent->actorList = g_list_append(ent->actorList,act);
00821   if (ent->actor == NULL)
00822   {
00823     ent->actor = act;
00824   }
00825 }
